remarks: A meet is less than or equal to a third value iff each argument is less than or equal to the third value.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
meetle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
meetle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
meetle.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetle.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. Poset ) $.
meetle.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
meetle.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
meetle.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
meetle.e $e |- ( ph -> <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ ) $.
meetle $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Z .<_ X /\ Z .<_ Y ) <-> Z .<_ ( X ./\ Y ) ) ) $.
